languages.text: Обратите внимание! В дальнейшем вам повстречаются кластеры маленьких кораблей — в бою они действуют по тем же правилам, что и торпеды.
Note: from here on out, you may encounter clusters of small ships that follow the same rules in combat as torpedoes.
languages.original_text: Обратите внимание! В дальнейшем вам повстречаются кластеры маленьких кораблей — в бою они действуют по тем же правилам, что и торпеды.

traits.locale_text: Note: from here on out, you may encounter clusters of small ships that follow the same rules in combat as torpedoes.
Note: from here on out, you may encounter clusters of small ships that follow the same rules in combat as torpedoes.
Note: from here on out, you may encounter clusters of small ships that follow the same rules in combat as torpedoes.
Note: from here on out, you may encounter clusters of small ships that follow the same rules in combat as torpedoes.
Note: from here on out, you may encounter clusters of small ships that follow the same rules in combat as torpedoes.

languages.text: Nota: Desde este momento puedes encontrar grupos de naves pequeñas que siguen las mismas reglas de combate que los torpedos.
languages.original_text: Note: from here on out, you may encounter clusters of small ships that follow the same rules in combat as torpedoes.

traits.locale_text: Nota: Desde este momento puedes encontrar grupos de naves pequeñas que siguen las mismas reglas de combate que los torpedos.

languages.text: 注：これから先、魚雷と同じルールで戦闘を行う小型船の群れに遭遇する可能性がある。
languages.original_text: Note: from here on out, you may encounter clusters of small ships that follow the same rules in combat as torpedoes.

traits.locale_text: 注：これから先、魚雷と同じルールで戦闘を行う小型船の群れに遭遇する可能性がある。

languages.text: 请注意，从现在开始，您可能会遭遇小型舰船集群。小型舰船集群的结算规则与鱼雷相同。
languages.original_text: Note: from here on out, you may encounter clusters of small ships that follow the same rules in combat as torpedoes.

traits.locale_text: 请注意，从现在开始，您可能会遭遇小型舰船集群。小型舰船集群的结算规则与鱼雷相同。

languages.text: Hinweis: Von nun an kann es vorkommen, dass du auf Gruppen von kleinen Schiffen triffst, die im Kampf dieselben Regeln befolgen wie Torpedos.
languages.original_text: Note: from here on out, you may encounter clusters of small ships that follow the same rules in combat as torpedoes.

traits.locale_text: Hinweis: Von nun an kann es vorkommen, dass du auf Gruppen von kleinen Schiffen triffst, die im Kampf dieselben Regeln befolgen wie Torpedos.

languages.text: Remarque : Il est désormais possible que vous croisiez des groupes de petits vaisseaux qui suivent les mêmes règles de combat que les torpilles.
languages.original_text: Note: from here on out, you may encounter clusters of small ships that follow the same rules in combat as torpedoes.

traits.locale_text: Remarque : Vous pouvez dès à présent rencontrer des groupes de petits vaisseaux qui suivent les mêmes règles de combat que les torpilles.

languages.text: Not: İleride torpidolarla aynı kurallara göre çalışan küçük gemi kümeleriyle karşılaşabilirsin.
languages.original_text: Note: from here on out, you may encounter clusters of small ships that follow the same rules in combat as torpedoes.
